This is the central page to find our online learning resources, free meals information as well as the lastest updates on COVID-19. Click on "Read Full Story."

Due to the current shelter in place/social distancing order, inter/intra district transfer requests will be filled out/submitted online starting Monday, April 20, 2020. Please see the following information and directions on how to submit the transfer requests.
Message from Superintendent Andy G. Alvarado

The 2020 Census is happening now! The Census results help determine how billions of dollars in federal funding flow into states & communities each year. These funds are used for school districts, law enforcement, firefighters and highway repairs. Your response matters. You can take the 2020 Census by clicking on the title of this feature. Make sure your family counts!

div.div:
Non Discrimination in District Programs
BP 0410 Central Unified is committed to providing equal opportunity for all individuals in education. District programs, activities, and practices shall be free from unlawful discrimination, including discrimination against an individual or group based on race, color, ancestry, nationality, national origin, ethnic group identification, age, religion, marital, pregnancy, or parental status, physical or mental disability, sex, sexual orientation, gender, gender identity or expression, or genetic information; a perception of one or more of such characteristics; or association with a person or group with one or more of these actual or perceived characteristics. Public Information
